attributes.title: Bricked my Phone
attributes.review: Every time I open this app it crashes horrifically. It shuts down my brand new iPhone XR and force restarts it. It has basically turned my phone into a brick. While the app is not functional in any way shape or form, the notification system is working almost too well. I get a notification from this app at least every 10 minutes, and even though Iâ€™ve turned the notifications off in settings, it still somehow doesnâ€™t turn off. This is a TERRIBLE app and I recommend NEVER purchasing it.

attributes.title: This app is CURSED IT SPREADS TRUE EVIL IT MUST BE DESTROYED NOW!!!!
attributes.review: From the moment of opening this app a portal emerged, in which contained the worst of Hells demons. These demons were grotesque and pure evil, they immediately started spreading hate, bigotry, racism, sexism, classism, homophobia, transphobia, greed and gluten throughout the country. This led to years of battle between the good and evil. The good are more powerful in numbers but the evil have weaponry which can kill several good people at once. I am one with the good but need your help to shut down this portal and dismantle the evil once and for all. Together we will defeat them. Destroy this app to conquer the evil.

attributes.title: Horrible Formatting...
attributes.review: Whoever decided an app meant to inform voters on the presidentâ€™s policies and events needed a rewards system and a way to connect with friends does not deserve their job. It made it almost impossible to find any real information about the president and just felt like pushy marketing. Additionally, if I have the app why should I have to consent to text messages and phone calls instead? Why canâ€™t you just send me messages through the app? Pushy and invasive, unhelpful, and overall a waste of phone storage space. Will be deleting.

attributes.title: DISGUSTING AND DISTURBING APP

attributes.title: I canâ€™t believe this!!!

As soon as i opened the app it started YELLING and SCREAMING â€œFAKE NEWS, ITS A HAUXâ€. I couldn't get it to stop! Before I knew it my ears started to bleed and my tongue had fallen out of my mouth!
